mapper.update: update review set recontent=#{recontent} , redate=sysdate where fid=#{fid} and memail=#{memail} and rtype=#{rtype}

UPDATE (select f.fid, FFUNDING_SCORE, rscore from funding f JOIN (select fid, round(avg(rscore),2) as rscore from review where rtype ='FUNDING' group by fid) r ON f.fid=r.fid) SET FFUNDING_SCORE = rscore
UPDATE (select f.fid, FSTORE_SCORE, rscore from funding f JOIN (select fid, round(avg(rscore),2) as rscore from review where rtype ='STORE' group by fid) r ON f.fid=r.fid) SET FSTORE_SCORE = rscore
